query:
-- Criar inspection_items para todos os ambientes que ainda não têm na vistoria 1
INSERT INTO inspection_items (
  inspection_id,
  environment_id,
  release_date,
  completion_date,
  responsible_construction,
  responsible_supplier,
  observations,
  signature_construction,
  signature_supplier,
  quantity,
  created_at,
  updated_at
)
SELECT 
  1 as inspection_id,
  e.id as environment_id,
  NULL as release_date,
  NULL as completion_date,
  '' as responsible_construction,
  '' as responsible_supplier,
  '' as observations,
  '' as signature_construction,
  '' as signature_supplier,
  1 as quantity,
  NOW() as created_at,
  NOW() as updated_at
FROM environments e
WHERE e.project_id = 1
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM inspection_items ii 
    WHERE ii.environment_id = e.id AND ii.inspection_id = 1
  );
